title: Faded
author: Alan Walker
lyrics:
[00:11.05] You were the shadow to my light, did you feel us?
[00:17.63] Another star, you fade away
[00:21.85] Afraid our aim is out of sight, wanna see us
[00:28.54] Alight
[00:31.10] Where are you now?
[00:36.36] Where are you now?
[00:41.67] Where are you now?
[00:44.11] Was it all in my fantasy?
[00:47.08] Where are you now?
[00:49.65] Were you only imaginary?
[00:53.71] Where are you now?
[00:57.03] Atlantis
[00:59.11] Under the sea, under the sea
[01:04.47] Where are you now?
[01:07.19] Another dream
[01:10.49] The monster's running wild inside of me
[01:14.49] I'm faded
[01:19.72] I'm faded
[01:23.53] So lost, I'm faded
[01:30.48] I'm faded
[01:34.25] So lost, I'm faded
[01:37.64] These shallow waters never met what I needed
[01:44.40] I'm letting go, a deeper dive
[01:48.39] Eternal silence of the sea, I'm breathing
[01:55.02] Alive
[01:57.68] Where are you now?
[02:02.95] Where are you now?
[02:08.32] Under the bright but faded lights
[02:10.91] You set my heart on fire
[02:13.62] Where are you now?
[02:16.49] Where are you now?
[02:21.01] 
[02:31.17] Where are you now?
[02:34.35] Atlantis
[02:36.24] Under the sea, under the sea
[02:41.61] Where are you now?
[02:44.45] Another dream
[02:47.60] The monster's running wild inside of me
[02:51.78] I'm faded
[02:57.16] I'm faded
[03:00.98] So lost, I'm faded
[03:07.64] I'm faded
[03:11.58] So lost, I'm faded
[03:14.12]
